subSubSection.paragraph:
Refer to the diagnosis of
D. hyalinipennis
for discussion of distinctive characters.

Discussion . Although macropterous and brachypterous forms of both sexes are known from Europe ( Wagner 1974 ; Sanchez & Cassis 2018 ), only brachypterous specimens of
D. stachydis
are currently known from European Russia and Caucasus.
